body.p: Starting with version 17.0, the support for is deprecated and will no longer be actively maintained. provides support for browsing and managing connections in the Data Source Explorer view. You can easily create new resources on the repository, copy and move them using contextual actions or the drag and drop support, or edit and transform the documents in the editor.
supports version 6.5 and 6.6 with Documentum Foundation Services 6.5 or 6.6 installed.
body.note: It is recommended to use the latest 1.6.x Java version. It is possible that the support will not work properly if you use other Java versions.
